name: Tom's Library
bio: A running list of books I've read...

books.title: An Introduction to Haiku
books.author: Harold Gould Henderson
books.notes: Brian suggested I get into Haiku and pick up this book and I'm glad I did! Beautiful, easy to read intro to Haiku. The author gives great context for what Haiku is, the main poets and how to read Haiku poetry. Recommended!

books.title: Pattern Recognition
books.author: William Gibson
books.notes: The consultant allergic to brands. Marketing agencies that wield global influence over culture.

books.title: Satin Island
books.author: Tom McCarthy
books.notes: Then the Great Report would not be something that was either to-come or completed
